Title: WPF XML FlowDocument sample
Description:
A simple example of rendering XML as a WPF FlowDocument.

It's implemented as an IValueConverter, but can also be used standalone.
HomeWiki:
A simple example of rendering XML to a WPF FlowDocument.

See here for more details: http://chriscavanagh.wordpress.com/2008/11/02/rendering-xml-as-a-flowdocument/
